name: daily-link-clipper
description: Obsidian plugin that clips links dropped into daily notes and routes them into wishlist and reading-list bases.

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run copy
scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp README.md dist/ && cp styles.css dist/ || true

author: Unintendedsideeffects
